itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Zinc Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Omar Lava Cave, Abandoned Iron Mine, and Ancient Fissure. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Zinc.

item.name: Mud Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Mud Crystals found near Glish Ruins.

item.name: Bloody Tree Knot
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Bloody Tree Knot requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Sinner's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Agerian Shoes of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Agerian Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Agerian Shoes of Duress, Agerian Shoes

item.name: Agerian Gloves of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Agerian Gloves\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Agerian Gloves of Duress, Agerian Gloves

item.name: Steel Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Energy of iron wall is contained within this Steel Taritas Helmet
Lighter than ordinary Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall, and more durable.

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc: Steel Taritas Shoes made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Shoes.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
